_description: The Braggart and his Baselard — eight quatrains (aaab) and burden: ‘Prenegard prenegard / þus bere I myn baselard’

BLSl2593.First Lines:
Lestenit lordynges I you besekeTher is non man worght a
                    leke…
BLSl2593.Last Lines:
…Che seyde I was a praty manne& wel cowde bere myn
                    basela[rd]
